title: New: Billie Black x Mura Masa – This Simple Pleasure
body:
Caught **Billie Black** a month or so back at London’s Electrowerkz, surrounded by 90% of the UK’s A&Rs; it was sweaty, claustrophobic and definitely full of potential.

Her latest track, featuring production from Mura Masa, is her most upbeat to date, and the most representative of her live set, combining early 00’s inspired R&B beats with a slick new take on contemporary dance music. Check out _This Simple Pleasure_ below.
